org.theta4j

Class Theta

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.theta4j.Theta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class Theta
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    This class provides the interface for RICOH THETA on PTP-IP.

      • initiateOpenCapture

        public long initiateOpenCapture()
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                PtpException
        Starts the video recording or the interval shooting.

        After starts, it can exit by the #terminateOpenCapture(long)

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException
        See Also:
        terminateOpenCapture(long)

        public void setExposureIndex(ISOSpeed isoSpeed)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             PtpException
        Sets the ISO sensitivity.

        Returns to the default value when the power is turned off.

        ISO sensitivity can be changed when ShutterSpeed is AUTO.

        Parameters:
        isoSpeed - An ISO speed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setStillCaptureMode

        public void setStillCaptureMode(StillCaptureMode stillCaptureMode)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                PtpException
        Sets the still image shooting method.

        Returns to the default value when the power is turned off or when #initiateOpenCapture() ends.

        Parameters:
        stillCaptureMode - A still capture mode to set.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException

      • getTimelapseNumber

        public int getTimelapseNumber()
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              PtpException
        Acquires the upper limit value for interval shooting.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException

      • setTimelapseNumber

        public void setTimelapseNumber(int timelapseNumber)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               PtpException
        Sets the upper limit value for interval shooting.

        Returns to the default value when the power is turned off.

        This property cannot be set when the StillCaptureMode is interval shooting mode. So, this property has to be set before switching the StillCaptureMode to interval shooting mode.

        Parameters:
        timelapseNumber - The upper limit value for interval shooting. The valid range is in 0 or 2-65535. The 0 means unlimited.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException

      • getTimelapseInterval

        public long getTimelapseInterval()
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 PtpException
        Acquires the shooting interval in msec for interval shooting.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException

      • setTimelapseInterval

        public void setTimelapseInterval(long timelapseInterval)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 PtpException
        Sets the shooting interval in msec for interval shooting.

        Returns to the default value when the power is turned off.

        This property cannot be set when the StillCaptureMode is interval shooting mode. So, this property has to be set before switching the StillCaptureMode to interval shooting mode.

        Parameters:
        timelapseInterval - The shooting interval in msec for interval shooting. The valid range is in 5000-3600000.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException

      • setAutoPowerOffDelay

        public void setAutoPowerOffDelay(int autoPowerOffDelay)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 PtpException
        Sets the time in minutes to start the auto power off.
        Parameters:
        autoPowerOffDelay - The time in minutes to start the auto power off. The valid range is in 0-30. The 0 disables the auto power off.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException

      • setSleepDelay

        public void setSleepDelay(int sleepDelay)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          PtpException
        Sets the time in seconds to start sleep.
        Parameters:
        sleepDelay - The time in seconds to start sleep. The valid range is in 0-1800. Does not switch to sleep mode with 0.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PtpException
